claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).
explanation: A flowchart illustrating influenza vaccination dosing recommendations for children aged 6 months through 8 years, indicating whether they received any trivalent or quadrivalent influenza vaccine before July 1, 2022, and recommending either 1 dose of 2022–23 influenza vaccine or 2 doses of 2022–23 influenza vaccine administered ≥4 weeks apart. does not support the claim because the figure shows pediatric dosing recommendations and does not mention Flublok, recombinant HA expression, insect cells, or a baculovirus expression vector system. Note: Image content is clear and readable, but unrelated to vaccine production methodologies.
